means: （使）下决心，（使）做出决定( determine的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentence.Network_cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentence.Network_en: Jane is determined to stake her claim as an actress.
sentence.Network_cn: 简决心主张自己作为一名女演员的权利。

sentence.Network_en: Sandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentence.Network_cn: 桑德拉决心成为医生，她的坚持取得了成功。

高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... bring sb back 送回某人 determine vi 决定；决心 live adv 现场地；直播地.
定_百度百科 ... （8） 决定[ decide] （10） 确定[ determine] （12） 规定[ stipulate].

妇产科医学名词-词汇翻译 ... 雌激素撤退试验 estrogen withdral test 测定 determination 测量 measurment.
决定论（determinism）是所有学科研究的出发点。进行任何科学研究之前都必须首先假设，宇宙事物之间有一定的规律或法则可循。

entry.tran: 下定决心的;决意的;坚定的
entry.def: If you are determined to do something, you have made a firm decision to do it and will not let anything stop you.

example.ex: His enemies are determined to ruin him...
example.tran: 他的敌人决意要毁了他。

example.ex: She is a remarkably adroit and determined politician...
example.tran: 她是一位精明干练且意志坚定的政治家。

means.word_mean: 2. having been learned or found or determined especially by investigation
3. devoting full strength and concentrated attention to;

sentences.sentence: "made continued and determined efforts to find and destroy enemy headquarters"

means.word_mean: 4. determined or decided upon as by an authority;

auth_sentence.content: Human brain hardware is determined by a genetic recipe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Human brain hardware is determined by a genetic recipe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Human brain hardware is determined by a genetic recipe.

auth_sentence.content: The authenticity of the photo couldn't be determined.
auth_sentence.res_content: The authenticity of the photo couldn't be determined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The authenticity of the photo couldn't be determined.

auth_sentence.content: European leaders are determined not to let that happen.
auth_sentence.res_content: European leaders are determined not to let that happen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: European leaders are determined not to let that happen.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

Sentence.sentence: Our food intake is determined by our biological needs.
On the basis of the police report, the Lummis Accident Committee correctly determined that McLaughlin had been quite careless.
Since this realization, I have begun to make an even more determined effort to find friends in unexpected people and places.

sentences.en: A s he was not reconciled to his defeat,he was determined to try again in the next contest.
sentences.cn: 他不甘心这次失败,决心在下次比赛中再作努力。

sentences.en: After he came out of prison, he was determined to keep his nose clean.
sentences.cn: 出狱以后,他下决心要安分守己。

sentences.en: After the devastating attack on its military bases, the country was determined not to be caught with its pants down a second time.
sentences.cn: 军事基地遭受破坏性袭击之后,该国下决心再不会被人打个措手不及。
